title: Australia v England: Ashes second Test, day three – live
summary: The hosts aim to extend their 44-run first-innings lead as play resumes at the Gabba. An over-by-over report is available for updates. Join our writers for live commentary on the match.

title: ‘We have to end the melancholy’: the French leftwing MP intent on resisting the far right
summary: Clémentine Autain emphasizes the necessity of a united leftwing alliance to prevent the rise of a far-right president. She advocates for a single leader to consolidate support and strengthen their position. Autain's call highlights the urgency of unity within the left to combat increasing far-right sentiments.

title: How to buy the greatest gifts: personal shoppers on their 17 rules for perfect presents
summary: December often brings significant stress due to budget constraints and the challenge of gift-giving. A guide is available to help navigate these pressures effectively. It offers tips on organizing and selecting the perfect gifts for everyone on your list.

title: Why is Timothée Chalamet suddenly everywhere? Seven things you need to know – from Oscars to puppies
summary: The 29-year-old star is receiving outstanding reviews for his performance in the upcoming film Marty Supreme. He is also attracting attention for his unique approach to celebrity life. Additionally, he continues to be regarded as the internet's boyfriend.

title: Australia swelters in severe heatwave as more than 50 bushfires burn across NSW
summary: Severe fire conditions persisted in eastern Australia, particularly impacting New South Wales and Tasmania. Several homes have been destroyed as wildfires spread in these regions. Authorities are on high alert as the situation remains critical.
